file_content.text: I hear you're giving Morsel a hard time. That you don't respect Nem'ro's authority.
What? Who are--oh, man. Look, I'm sorry, I am really sorry.
Me and the boys were just having some fun. We didn't think--you're not going to kill me, are you?
If I have to come back out here, it will be the last time.
You are not going to have to come out here again, boss. I guarantee it!
Look, it's not that big a deal. Let "Morsel" do his job and everything's fine.
All right, no problem. And thanks for not being all hard about it.
We won't give Morsel a hard time anymore. Won't even laugh at his name. Swear.
Every day the same problems. Stupid Evocii.
